column1: @entity1 and Jeff are close friends. Their school is having a guessing game to guess how manygumballs are in a box. If they get the right amount they win $One @entity0. If they get close theyget a $Twenty gift card. The box looks like it is missing some gumballs. It turns out somepeople are eating them when they place their guess. One @entity0 people guessed and took a piece ofcandy. The box is @entity3" by @entity3" by @entity3". Each gumball is One" each. @entity1 guessed Five @entity0. Jeffguessed @entity2 @entity0. They both said they would split their money they win, if they win.
@placeholder likely would it be for one of them to win
